name: Night Pursuit
description:
GAMES INFO :

Keys: space, left and right arrows

End of the game at 300 of score ; )

If the game doesn't answer, click on the game to put the focus on it

Little jam game, this is my second one. I thank Cyber Squib for the music, it is really great. Some assets are inspired by pixel art found on the internet, but everything is handmade. I take all advice, reviews and potential bugs found.

Note: the game may take a while to load, it is made in vanilla javascript without game engine or framework.
